title: Infrastructure Software Engineer I
details:
* Designed, developed, and supported web based applications as a full-stack developer
 * Created RESTful APIs using the Swagger framework, Python and Node.js, leveraging Flask, React, and PostgreSQL
 * Collaborated with a team of five multispecialists under an AGILE/SCRUM approach
 * Created Powershell scripts and models for analysis of Active Directory objects

title: Cloud Engineering Co-op
details:
* Produced middleware to support a proprietary server provisioning service with Python
* Documented the dependencies of a proprietary server provisioning web application

title: IAAS Co-op
details:
* Led the development of a SharePoint web application using JavaScript 
* Supported the Managing Director of Infrastructure Services in establishing a formal onboarding process for all technology products at the firm

title: QA Co-op
details:
* Collaborated with a team of four developers to create automated tests of tablet GUIs
* Developed automated tests scripts in VBScript
* Utilized the tools and features of the automated testing platform TestComplete

title: Software Development Co-op
details:
* Developed, debugged, and pushed features to a client facing GUI
* Debugged and refactored the backend of applications written in C++
* Wrote a dynamic Excel dictionary of the company's mortgage pricing instruments
